nodes.text: Hello friend! Will you sing a song of Praise with me? . . . Once I was wandering blind, In a land that was so unkind . . .
He finds you when and where you least expect it! Praise the Master! Praise the Holy Flame! Praise the world!
The one who sits above. The one who sits below. The one who rests within. Praise the Master for such clarity of vision!
Hmm, that's not what I had in mind. You had better practice, my friend. Praise to the Master! Praise the Holy Flame!
What a wonderful joke! I used to have no sense of humor, but thanks to the Master, I am full of mirth! Praise the Master!
Oh, if only I were so fortunate! Perhaps one day the Master will let me kiss his body parts. Praise the Master! Praise the Holy Flame!

links.text: I hate to interrupt your hymn, but where might I meet the Master?
Happy! Happy! I sing song good!
. . . but now I kiss the Master's behind . . .
